Both movies are classics that I believe you'll thoroughly enjoy!

Enjoy your viewing!

I'd highly recommend watching "Lady in the Water". It's a unique and captivating film directed by M. Night Shyamalan, starring Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, and Freddy Rodríguez. The story revolves around an apartment building superintendent who discovers a mysterious woman that he believes is a character from a bedtime story, creating a fascinating tale about the struggle between reality and fantasy.

Another interesting choice would be "Man on Wire", a documentary about tightrope walker Philippe Petit's legendary high-wire routine performed between the Twin Towers in New York City. It's an inspiring true story that showcases human courage and determination. Enjoy your viewing!

Both films offer intriguing plots and engaging performances. Enjoy!
